Class DataAccessFactory

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.DataAccessFactory
public class DataAccessFactory extends Object
Factory class for managing and instantiating image data access components. This class uses registered DataAccessComponent entries to provide instances of image data access implementations based on file extension or magic number.
See Also:
  • ImageDataAccess

  • Method Details

    • getSupportedExtensions

      public static List<String> getSupportedExtensions()
      Retrieves a list of supported file extensions from the registered data access components.
      Returns:
      a List of supported file extensions

    • getDefaultMagicNumberFromExtension

      public static Optional<String> getDefaultMagicNumberFromExtension(String extension)
      Retrieves the default magic number associated with a given file extension.
      Parameters:
      extension - the file extension
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the default magic number, or empty if not found

    • getInstance

      public static ImageDataAccess getInstance(String path) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates an instance of ImageDataAccess for a given file path. The factory determines the appropriate implementation by reading the file's magic number.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the image file
      Returns:
      an instance of ImageDataAccess
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read or the file type is unsupported
      IllegalAccessException - if an error occurs while creating the instance

    • getInstanceFromMagicNumber

      public static ImageDataAccess getInstanceFromMagicNumber(String magicNumber) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates an instance of ImageDataAccess based on the provided magic number.
      Parameters:
      magicNumber - the magic number of the image file
      Returns:
      an instance of ImageDataAccess
      Throws:
      IOException - if the magic number is unsupported
      IllegalAccessException - if an error occurs while creating the instance

    • getInstanceFromExtension

      public static ImageDataAccess getInstanceFromExtension(String extension) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates an instance of ImageDataAccess based on the provided file extension.
      Parameters:
      extension - the file extension
      Returns:
      an instance of ImageDataAccess
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file extension is unsupported
      IllegalAccessException - if an error occurs while creating the instance

    • getSingletonInstance

      static Object getSingletonInstance(Class<?> clazz) throws IllegalAccessException
      Retrieves the singleton instance of a class by invoking its `getInstance` method.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class to retrieve the instance from
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the class
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - if the `getInstance` method throws an exception or is inaccessible

      Throws:

    • getFromMagicNumber

      private static Class<?> getFromMagicNumber(String magicNumber)
      Retrieves the class corresponding to the given magic number from the registered components.
      Parameters:
      magicNumber - the magic number to search for
      Returns:
      the Class associated with the magic number, or null if not found

      Returns:
